name: ptr::non_null::NonNull::<T>::new_unchecked::precondition_check

macro_backtrace.callsite:
assert_unsafe_precondition!(
                check_language_ub,
                "NonNull::new_unchecked requires that the pointer is non-null",
                (ptr: *mut () = ptr as *mut ()) => !ptr.is_null()
            )
